name: acp3/tests
description: Repository of the ACP3 CMS unit test configuration files.

scripts-descriptions.test: Runs the PHPUnits test WITHOUT coverage.
scripts-descriptions.test-windows: Runs the PHPUnits test WITHOUT coverage for Windows based systems.
scripts-descriptions.test-with-coverage: Runs the PHPUnits test WITH coverage.
scripts-descriptions.lint: Runs PHP-CS-Fixer WITHOUT fixing the code style errors.
scripts-descriptions.lint-windows: Runs PHP-CS-Fixer WITHOUT fixing the code style errors for Windows based systems.
scripts-descriptions.php-cs-fixer: Runs PHP-CS-Fixer WITH fixing the code style errors.
scripts-descriptions.php-cs-fixer-windows: Runs PHP-CS-Fixer WITH fixing the code style errors for Windows based systems.
scripts-descriptions.phpstan-windows: Runs PHPStan for Windows based systems.
